## Source: ECMWF

ECMWF --> the European Center for Medium-range Weather Forecasting

![alt text]("images/Hurricane_Models_Graphic.jpg")

For more weather data options, look to the National Weather Service, NASA, or the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA).

---

## A New File Type: "*.GRIB*"

The GRIB data type:

- Has existed in various iterations since 1985
- Built for regular updating & dissemination for weather data
- **GRI**dded **B**inary 
    - "Low storage"
    - Independent grid cell composition
